query.statement:
SELECT A.PSPID ,(SELECT ZSITE_NM FROM SAPHEE.ZMASTER01 C WHERE C.MANDT = A.MANDT AND C.POSID = CASE WHEN LENGTH(A.PSPID) > 6 THEN SUBSTR(A.PSPID,2,6) ELSE A.PSPID END FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY) PSPID_NM ,B.ITEMTX ,(SELECT ZQNTY FROM SAPHEE.ZMASTER01 AS MA WHERE MA.MANDT = A.MANDT AND MA.POSID = CASE WHEN LENGTH(A.PSPID) > 6 THEN SUBSTR(A.PSPID,2,6) ELSE A.PSPID END) AS QUAN ,C.J_1KFREPRE ,C.NAME1 ,C.MCOD3||' '||STRAS AS ADDR ,SUBSTR(WRKLFN,1,3)||'-'||SUBSTR(WRKLFN,4,2)||'-'||SUBSTR(WRKLFN,6) AS WRKLFN ,(SELECT DISTINCT KTEXT FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT024 C WHERE C.MANDT = A.MANDT AND C.KOKRS = '1000' AND C.KOSTL = A.KOSTL FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY) KTEXT ,J_TEMNO ,J_NAME FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0117 A LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT A.MANDT, A.PSPID, A.GUBUN, A.HKONT, A.SEQNO, CASE WHEN B.CNT > 0 THEN A.ITEMTX||' ¿Ü '||TRIM(CHAR(B.CNT))||'°Ç' ELSE A.ITEMTX END AS ITEMTX FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0117L A, ( SELECT MANDT, PSPID, GUBUN, HKONT, SEQNO, MIN(ITEMNO) AS ITEMNO, COUNT(*)-1 AS CNT FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0117L WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND PSPID = #PSPID# AND GUBUN = #GUBUN# AND HKONT = #HKONT# AND SEQNO = #SEQNO# GROUP BY MANDT,PSPID,GUBUN,HKONT,SEQNO ) B WHERE A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.PSPID = B.PSPID AND A.GUBUN = B.GUBUN AND A.HKONT = B.HKONT AND A.SEQNO = B.SEQNO AND A.ITEMNO = B.ITEMNO ) B ON A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.PSPID = B.PSPID AND A.GUBUN = B.GUBUN AND A.HKONT = B.HKONT AND A.SEQNO = B.SEQNO LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMMT012 AS C ON A.MANDT = C.MANDT AND A.WRKLFN = C.LIFNR WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.PSPID = #PSPID# AND A.GUBUN = #GUBUN# AND A.HKONT = #HKONT# AND A.SEQNO = #SEQNO#
FOR FETCH ONLY WITH UR
